channel.title: Projects on Ted Dickey
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Ted Dickey

item.title: Project 1: Data Cleaning in SQL
item.description: Extracted data from csv file from server. Standardized date format. Populatated some missing PropertyAddress fields. Split Address field into Address, City and State features. Changed ‘Y’ and ‘N’ to ‘Yes’ and ‘No’ in ‘Sold as Vacant’ field. Removed clearly duplicated records. Removed unused columns. SQL Code Snippet Project 1 Link to Github Repository

item.title: Project 2: Customer Market Segmentation
item.description: Unsupervised Machine Learning Example (Python) Problem Statement: Understand the target customers for the marketing team to plan a strategy. Context: Client wants the most important shopping groups identified based on income, age, and the mall shopping score. Client wants the ideal number of groups with a label for each. Created subsets of a market based on demographic behavioral criteria to better understand the target for marketing activities. Data provided needed minimal cleaning and tranformation of Gender predictor from character to factor.

item.title: Project 3: Corporate Tax Havens Dashboard
item.description: ** Project Summary ** Constructed Dashboard that shows all cash offshore, estimated US tax bill and totalk offshore subsidiares as KPIs. Drill-down menus for company or country Global map depiction of locations Tables for top tax havens by country and amounts Project 3 Link to Tableau Public
